rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you are stagnant, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature instead. Damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn is dealt to Lanz instead. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Vigilance, trample
Lanz and Sena, Power Unbound enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of damage dealt this turn.
{T}, Remove five +1/+1 counters from Lanz and Sena, Power Unbound: It gains indestructible until end of turn. Damage that would be dealt to Lanz and Sena, Power Unbound this turn is dealt to that sources controller instead.
